page.title: 17 Domesday Project Mitcham.
page.content: In Mitcham there are many shops. There are three supermarkets in Mitcham and also many restaurants, and take away food stores.The equipment for shops is quite modern. The tills are all computerized.Most tobacconist shops sell not only sweets and tobacco but also writing pads,pens etc.The grocery stores have the goods on show outside the shop.There is a law that says cigarettes can't be sold to people under the age of 16.The pubs in Mitcham are clean and situated in good places.They open at 5:30 and close at 10:30 but in Wimbledon they close at 11:00.On special occasions some pubs stay open until midnight.In Mitcham at night there's not much traffic about, and if you're wandering about there's not much to do. {continued....
